quality_assessment: Page provides useful log location and cleanup information, but has several drift issues including incorrect command syntax and missing current log directory

issues.description: The 'prodigy sessions clean --completed' command does not exist. The CLI only supports 'prodigy sessions clean' with '--all' and '--force' flags
issues.fix_suggestion: Update command to use valid CLI flags: 'prodigy sessions clean --all' or 'prodigy sessions clean -f' for force mode

issues.description: The Claude logs location shown is outdated. Current implementation uses ~/.claude/projects/ not ~/.local/state/claude/logs/
issues.fix_suggestion: Update the Claude logs path in all platform tabs to ~/.claude/projects/ which is the current implementation

issues.description: The find command for cleaning old Claude logs uses the wrong path
issues.fix_suggestion: Update the path and file extension (.jsonl is the primary format) to match actual log location

issues.description: Missing information about the 'prodigy logs' command for managing Claude logs
issues.fix_suggestion: Add reference to 'prodigy logs' command which provides --latest, --tail, and --summary options for viewing Claude logs

issues.description: Missing the 'prodigy clean logs' command for cleaning Claude logs with duration-based retention
issues.fix_suggestion: Add example using 'prodigy clean logs --older-than 30d' which provides integrated log cleanup with dry-run support

positive_aspects: Good use of MkDocs Material tabbed content for cross-platform paths
Helpful warning admonition about disk space considerations
Clear examples for debugging workflow failures and monitoring MapReduce
Good structure covering locations, cleanup, and usage examples
improvement_suggestions: Add section on using 'prodigy logs' command for integrated log viewing
Include 'prodigy clean logs' command as the preferred cleanup method
Add code annotations to explain jq filters in examples
Consider adding a troubleshooting section for common log analysis scenarios

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
